resources.string: Looping Dice
Looping Dice is a game by Josh Mermelstein
\"The source code is available on my Github and is licensed under the GPL v3.0 license \"
It is inspired by the Sixteen Puzzle from Simon Tatham\'s Portable Puzzle Collection
Gear mode was inspired by geared puzzles such as The Gear Cube by Oskar van Deventer
Static cells and bandaging were inspired by different schemes of bandaging other twisty puzzles
Dynamic bandaging was inspired by The constrained cube by TomZ and The joint cube by Grigr and Fenz
Carousel mode was inspired by the android app, squareminx by Katas Studios
Enabler mode was inspired by The enabler cube by Oskar van Deventer
Click here for information on open source libraries used by Looping Dice.
Cells containing arrows can only move in some directions.
Moves cannot push a black square off the edge of the board
Moves must contain a gold square
black squares prevent moves
